metadata.title: Paul Guerrero Linares - Software Engineer
metadata.description: Professional portfolio of Paul Guerrero Linares - Software Engineer specializing in full-stack development, AI/ML pipelines, and cloud-native architectures.

hero.name: Paul Guerrero
hero.description: Building robust solutions at the intersection of full-stack development, AI/ML pipelines, and cloud-native architectures.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Engineer by passion, problem solver by nature

bio.p1: Computer engineer with a solid foundation in backend and frontend development, evolved into a rare hybrid profile: someone who codes, understands architecture, masters complex pipelines, and operates in strict security environments.
bio.p2: Notable for designing and maintaining high-level pipelines, especially in OCR, computer vision, and multimodal language models. Building solutions with docTR, PaddleOCR, LayoutLMv3, and Qwen3-VL, deploying them in on-prem Kubernetes while meeting strict security requirements.
bio.p3: Beyond coding, I understand Scrum from the inside, participate in refinements, write clear user stories, manage technical debt, and anticipate sprint risks. The goal is not just working software, but a working team.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.more: + Tools, methodologies, and more in my experience section

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects I've worked on, from AI pipelines to full-stack applications.

ocr-pipeline.title: Intelligent Document Processing Pipeline
ocr-pipeline.description: End-to-end OCR and document understanding pipeline using state-of-the-art vision-language models.
ocr-pipeline.longDescription: A complete pipeline for extracting structured data from documents using docTR, PaddleOCR, LayoutLMv3, and Qwen3-VL. Deployed on Kubernetes with GPU support and strict security compliance.

finnk-onboarding.title: Digital Banking Onboarding
finnk-onboarding.description: Critical digital onboarding flows for Finnk investment platform with document validation and OTP verification.

iot-dashboard.title: IoT Device Monitoring Dashboard
iot-dashboard.description: Real-time monitoring dashboard for IoT devices with AWS integration and device shadow management.

automation-toolkit.title: Web Scraping & Automation Toolkit
automation-toolkit.description: Collection of Python tools for web scraping, task automation, and data processing utilities.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey through software engineering, from IoT solutions to AI-powered systems.

finnk.description: Development of key functionalities within the Finnk ecosystem, combining frontend (Angular, Ionic/Capacitor, Angular Material, charting libraries) and backend Java in complex corporate environments.
highlights: Evolution of critical digital onboarding flows: document upload, validations, OTP, promotions, and financial visualization components
Continuous integration and deployments via Kubernetes with automated GitLab CI pipelines
Close collaboration with business, marketing, and security teams to align requirements and validate sensitive flows
Intervention in environments with legacy architectures and custom Java modules, ensuring compatibility and stability

onnera.description: Development of IoT solutions combining Angular, Spring Boot, and AWS cloud services.
highlights: Implementation of lambdas, queues, topics, and device shadow for device-backend communication
Creation of dashboards and internal tools for device monitoring and IoT network status
Work under Scrum methodology, participating in sprints, refinements, estimation, and continuous improvement

personal.description: Constant development of personal projects in Python, especially for webscraping, task automation, and internal utilities.
highlights: In-depth experimentation with open-source AI, building complete OCR and data extraction pipelines from official documentation
Continuous practice in containerization, Docker image creation, environment automation, and evaluation of vision-language models on local GPU
Research and adoption of new tools, patterns, and architectures to improve productivity and technical quality

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to discuss opportunities? I'd love to hear from you.

info.title: Let's Connect
info.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.

contact.cta: Feel free to reach out through any of these channels!
